segments.en: “Mendicants, there are these five powers of a female.
Attractiveness, wealth, relatives, children, and ethical behavior.

segments.pli: Na, bhikkhave, mātugāmo rūpabalahetu vā bhogabalahetu vā ñātibalahetu vā puttabalahetu vā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati.
segments.en: It is not because of the powers of attractiveness, wealth, relatives, or children that females, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.

segments.pli: Sīlabalahetu kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati.
segments.en: It is because of the power of ethical behavior that females, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.

segments.pli: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañca mātugāmassa balānī”ti.
segments.en: These are the five powers of a female.”

sections.title: “Mendicants, there are these five powers of a female.…

suttaplex.blurb: It is not because of beauty, wealth, relatives, or sons that a woman has a good rebirth, but because of ethical conduct.
